item.title: Error NETSDK1045
item.description: Error NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 6.0 A colleague had Visual Studio shout this (see ðŸ‘‡) at him when he loaded up a FunctionsApp project. He received this error twice as the second project was the unit tests for the FunctionsApp. Error NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 6.0. Either target .NET 5.0 or lower, or use a version of the .
